sentences.english: Large - area communicated well group will surely take shape at the middle and later stage of rock salt mining.

sentences.english: Production period of brine well is an item which all salt mines attention.

sentences.english: Quartztes and rock salt have the highest conductivities.

sentences.english: Problem was, the salt attracted cattle.

sentences.english: Gypsum and halite are simply thinned or removed altogether .
sentences.chinese: 石膏与岩盐则逐渐变薄或完全被溶解掉。

sentences.english: Some of the world's supply of salt is mined as rock salt.

sentences.english: At last, references of . water-proof and protection of railway base were given.
sentences.chinese: 为铁路岩盐路基的防洪及采取防护措施提供科学依据。

sentences.english: We have a shovel outside, and we usually have a supply of rock salt .
sentences.chinese: 我们有一个铲以外，我们通常有很多供应岩盐。

sentences.english: Highstand system tracts are formed by thick-massive rock salts intercalated by thin layers of mudstone and sandstone.
sentences.chinese: 高位体系域为厚层块状岩盐夹薄层泥岩和砂岩。
